Class Lift

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Lift
  • public class Lift
extends greenfoot.Actor
    Lift simulation: Floor
    Version:
  • V0.4 18.12.2017 old Version,
  • V0.5 21.08.2017 Refactoring,
  • V0.6 30.08.2017 Liftcontrolling,
  • V0.7 12.12.2020 fixed: Persons on edge floor are left out Lift is moving without buttons hit,
  • V0.8 12.12.2020 fixed: While going up an empty - not stopping for oposite direction

    KEL
